div.class: bg-gdpr-white rounded-lg p-6 shadow-sm border-l-4 border-gdpr-mint
w-full bg-gdpr-mist rounded-full h-3 mb-4 overflow-hidden
grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-5 gap-6 mb-8 relative
bg-gdpr-white rounded-lg p-4 shadow-sm flex flex-col items-center text-center space-y-3 w-full max-w-[240px] cursor-pointer relative transition-all duration-300
div.style: opacity: 1; transform: none; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0px 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0px 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0px 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0px 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 2px -1px;

div.class: w-7 h-7 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center border-2 bg-gdpr-white
w-8 h-8 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center
gdpr-micro-tag mt-2 px-2 py-1 rounded transition-colors duration-300 bg-gray-50
bg-gdpr-white rounded-lg p-4 shadow-sm flex flex-col items-center text-center space-y-3 w-full max-w-[240px] cursor-pointer relative transition-all duration-300

div.p: A smarter path to data protection—start your next step.

button.class: px-6 py-3 bg-gdpr-charcoal text-gdpr-white rounded-lg gdpr-body font-medium hover:opacity-90 transition-opacity
